body_html: HalfTensor on CPU has no operations defined on it except copy and serialization. We have no plans to change this in the short-term either, because HalfTensor representations cannot be made efficient on Intel CPUs (there are no hardware instructions in that direction)
body_text: HalfTensor on CPU has no operations defined on it except copy and serialization. We have no plans to change this in the short-term either, because HalfTensor representations cannot be made efficient on Intel CPUs (there are no hardware instructions in that direction)
body: HalfTensor on CPU has no operations defined on it except `copy` and serialization. We have no plans to change this in the short-term either, because HalfTensor representations cannot be made efficient on Intel CPUs (there are no hardware instructions in that direction)
